# orthographicScale

**Instance Property**

The orthographic scale SceneKit uses when rendering the shadow map for a directional light.

## Declaration

```swift
var orthographicScale: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

SceneKit draws a shadow map image by rendering the scene from the point of view of the node containing the light. Directional lights ignore the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/position] property of the node containing them because their light has a constant direction. Therefore, rendering a shadow map for a directional light requires an orthographic projection. Like the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNCamera/orthographicScale] property of a camera object, this property specifies the extent of the scene “visible to” the light when rendering the shadow map.

This property applies only if the light’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/type] property is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/LightType/directional].

## Managing Shadows Cast by the Light

- **castsShadow**: A Boolean value that determines whether the light casts shadows.
- **shadowRadius**: A number that specifies the amount of blurring around the edges of shadows cast by the light. Animatable.
- **shadowColor**: The color of shadows cast by the light. Animatable.
- **shadowMapSize**: The size of the shadow map image that SceneKit renders when creating shadows.
- **shadowSampleCount**: The number of samples from the shadow map that SceneKit uses to render each pixel.
- **shadowMode**: The mode SceneKit uses to render shadows.
- **SCNShadowMode**: Options for SceneKit’s rendering of shadows cast by a light, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/shadowMode] property.
- **shadowBias**: The amount of correction to apply to the shadow to prevent rendering artifacts.
- **zFar**: The maximum distance between the light and a visible surface for casting shadows.
- **zNear**: The minimum distance between the light and a visible surface for casting shadows. Animatable.
